title: Premiere: Graveyard Club – Diamond City
body:
Photo: Chelsea Rice

Minneapolis quartet **Graveyard Club** write the sort of upbeat yet slightly ominous synth-pop that New Order pioneered back in the 80’s; anthemic, emotive and somehow exceedingly danceable.

Their latest track, _Diamond City_, lifted from **_Cellar Door_**, their sophomore record out later in the year, is insanely addictive and absolutely perfect for those summer playlists. Full of energy and character, it suggests a very exciting LP may well be on the way. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
